name: Advertising Services
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that prepare advertising (copywriting, artwork, graphics,
and other creative work) and place advertising in periodicals,
newspapers, radio, television, or other advertising media for clients
on a contract or fee basis. Other types of advertising such as aerial
advertising, coupon distribution, distribution of samples, and
skywriting are also included.
